Copyright © 2020 weline.io ID SN EffectiveTime Latest price Traffic price is about to change Traffic price change of plan has been canceled CNY USD Mark all read Unprocessed Welcome to WeLine. We attach great importance to your privacy and protection of personal information and have formulated our privacy policy in relation to collection, use and protection of personal information. The main contents are:\n 1．How do we collect and use your personal information \n 2．How do we share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information \n 3．How do we store your personal information \n 4．How do we protect your personal information \n 5．How do we use Cookies and similar technologies \n 6．How do we handle minors\' personal information \n 7．How can you exercise your right to manage your personal information We have stipulated specific rules for account registration, usage of Weline services and relevant requirements in the User Agreement. For more details, you may refer to the full version of the $P$ and $P$. And if you agree to the foregoing two documents, please click Confirm to start our services. Select disk mode Disk manage Does not support extension format expansion Formatting... Please keep the power and network status, do not restart or shut down the device Formatting success Formatting failed LVMMode BasicMode RAID0Mode RAID1Mode RAID5Mode RAID10Mode System space: Using Confirm expansion To be configured Disk position RAID 5 provides fault-tolerant protection and improves read performance. It requires at least three hard drives. RAID5 can maintain operation when a single hard disk is lost. When a hard disk fails, the data on that disk will be reconstructed from the parity on the remaining hard disks. RAID 10 combines the advantages of RAID 1 and RAID 0. Four hard drives are required. The read and write performance has been improved and fault-tolerant protection is provided, but the space used to store data is only half of the total space. This mode will clear all the data in the built-in hard disk and initialize it, please choose carefully!

Last detection time: Start checking Check again Hard disk self-check No check record Checking, please wait... hard disk Hard Disk Name: Use time: good abnormal tool The task already exists Download queue full WeLine Favorites Favorite Unfavorite External storage Deduplication DLNA Samba Please enter "Confirm format". After formatting, all the contents of the hard disk will be deleted. This operation cannot be undone. During this process, please keep the power and network status, do not restart or turn off the device! Confirm format Please enter "Confirm expansion". The expansion operation will format the new hard disk and integrate it into the device\'s disk array to increase the overall capacity. This operation will format and clear the data in the new hard disk. Do you want to execute it? Please enter a password of 6-20 digits and letters Set up the password protection for the Safe Move in file Cannot be the same as the old password Cannot be the same as the old password protection Deduplication Deduplication allows you to find and remove duplicate files in the device, which is conducive to saving storage space. The best way is to specify several folders to compare and remove duplicates in batches. It may take a long time to scan the entire disk to remove duplicates.
